title: Fresh Peach Pie â€“ Original Recipe
ingredients: Whipped cream, for serving in style
instructions: Combine the cornstarch and sugar in a saucepan and stir in the water; mixing well to dissolve the sugar and cornstarch.  Set the mixture over medium-high heat and bring it to a boil.  Stirring, boil the mixture until it thickens then add the gelatin powder and continue stirring until it is completely dissolved.  When the gelatin powder is completely dissolved, add the sliced peaches and remove from the heat.
Pour the peach/gelatin mixture into the prepared pie crust and refrigerate.
Serve with a whipped cream topping.
source: Express-News, Food Section, Cook It Light by Jeanne Jones, Original Recipe from Sarah Jesse of , Wednesday, August 17, 2005.
